review: Switched from Chromecast. Much easier to manage. Couldn't get Amazon on Chromecast. Like to so far.
author: RobinSteb "Love to read all kinds of books. While on the treadmill I will be able to listen to what I was reading to help pass the time."

review: I haven't tried Amazon Prime on it yet, but it works fine for Netflix.  Only glitch was getting the remote open to put in batteries.  Not easy to open.
author: dreamart

review: For some reason our fire stick will only work on our bedroom tv not our family room tv. Can't figure out why.
author: Tiffany Brandner

review: OK,I really haven't fully tested it yet.I got it as an upgrade to my old Roku.Twice tried to get a movie on it,got message that my signal was too weak.Immediately tried same movie with Roku,worked fine.Also found it more confusing to identify and access shows.Maybe I can resolve these issues with more experience with the product,but don't think that should be necessary.
author: robert stlawrence

review: Love this item!!!! The fire stick has great quality picture, easy to use, and has tons of applications like cooking recipes and work out programs. Highly recommend!
author: Mike
